explains: n. 中庭，天井前厅；[解剖] 心房
wordGroup: left atrium 左心房，左心耳

sentences.en: The upper chamber on each side is called the atrium.
sentences.cn: 每侧上面的腔室称为心房。

sentences.en: Twenty-six meeting pods float in midair around the 10-story atrium...
sentences.cn: 在大楼的高达10层的中庭，26间会议室点缀在半空。

sentences.en: I stood in the impressive atrium and found myself thinking of the Hyatt Regency hotel in Atlanta.
sentences.cn: 我站在博物馆的中庭里，发现心里想到了亚特兰大的凯悦摄政酒店。
